com.cmput3owo1.moodlet.services

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput3owo1.moodlet.services.UserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUserServiceProvider

    public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUserServiceProvider
    User Service that handles all database access and authentication that is required by a user. This service is to abstract the Firestore and Firebase auth away from the rest of the fragments

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.cmput3owo1.moodlet.services.IUserServiceProvider

        IUserServiceProvider.LoginListener, IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener

      void createUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String fullname, IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener listener)
      This a wrapper function that is called to create a user account with their email and password.
      boolean hasPreviousLogin()
      This function is called to check if there is an existing instance of the logged in user.

      • validateUsernameAndCreateUser

        public void validateUsernameAndCreateUser(java.lang.String username,
                                          java.lang.String email,
                                          java.lang.String password,
                                          java.lang.String fullname,
                                          IUserServiceProvider.RegistrationListener listener)
        This function first checks if the username is taken. If the username is not taken, the account will be created, otherwise it will notify the user that their username is already taken
        Specified by:
        validateUsernameAndCreateUser in interface IUserServiceProvider
        Parameters:
        username - Username to register with.
        email - Email to register with.
        password - Password of Account to register with.
        fullname - Full name of user registering.
        listener - Registration listener passed from fragment
